values: 做（饭）；烹调；烹饪；当厨师；烧；煮；发生；<非正式>篡改；捏造；被烹调；被烧煮
厨师；厨子；大厨；炊事员；（Cook）库克（人名）

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 炊具；烹饪用水果；窜改者

word_group.brief_definition: 厨师多了烧坏汤；人多手杂反坏事, 人多添乱
word_group.phrase: too many cooks spoil the broth

word_group.brief_definition: 篡改, 杜撰, 捏造
如火如荼地进行；做得起劲
使（某人的计划等）受挫；使垮台
做多种重要日常工作的人；身兼巨细的人

bilingual.source: I want to cook for my family.
I can cook and use the washing machine.
bilingual.target: 我会做饭并使用洗衣机。

bilingual.source: I can't cook, but I love great food.
bilingual.target: 我不会做饭，但我喜欢美食。

bilingual.source: You can soon cook for your family.
bilingual.target: 你很快就能为你的家人做饭了。

bilingual.source: They will cook, clean and wash the dishes.
bilingual.target: 他们会做饭、打扫和洗碗。

bilingual.source: I don't cook so I don't need an oven.
bilingual.target: 我不做饭，所以我不需要烤箱。

list.abstract: cook（[kʊk]），英语单词，作动词为烹调，煮，烧。作名词为烹饪者，厨师，炊事员。短语搭配有cook up a storm（煮得一手好菜）。例句为“Cook a dish for the party.（为聚会做一道菜。）” cook相关近义词有chef、kitchener。
cook，电影《歌声不绝》中的人物，由 迈克尔·法斯宾德饰演。

yingyinNormal.en: Who's going to cook here once David's gone?
yingyinNormal.zh: 大卫走了之后谁来做饭呢？
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《大卫·贝克汉姆：探索未知之境》

yingyinNormal.en: Well, maybe that's 'cause Leonard can't cook. You can't cook and you made me this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 估计是因为莱纳德不会做饭吧。你也不会做饭，但是你为我做了这些。

yingyinNormal.en: I didn't expect to see you as a cook and a water carrier.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我也没料到你还会做饭提水。

yingyinNormal.en: My grandmother's my biggest source of inspiration because she used to have to cook for all her family.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我奶奶是我灵感最大的源泉，因为她曾经要给全家人做饭。

yingyinNormal.en: Howard, the poor thing just got home from work. Let me get you a glass of wine. I'll cook dinner.
yingyinNormal.zh: Howard，这可怜的孩子才刚工作完回来，我给你倒杯红酒吧，我来做饭。

yingyinNormal.en: And this is Belt. Cook, conversationalist, navigator. Also, keeps my pants up. What are "pants up"?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个是皮带猴，负责做饭，聊天，指路，还有帮我提着裤子。"提着裤子"是什么?

yingyinNormal.en: If you'd rather cook at home, you can shop at over 3,000 supermarket chains and hundreds of thousands of independent grocery stores in the U.S..
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你更喜欢在家自己做饭，在美国，你能在超过3000家连锁超市以及成百上千家杂货店里，买到需要的食材。

yingyinNormal.en: Run along, I have a crab to cook.
yingyinNormal.zh: 走开，我要烧死这头蟹。

yingyinNormal.en: That's Oleg. He's the cook. He is gorgeous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是Oleg 他是厨师。他帅呆了。

yingyinNormal.en: Get the wood. I can't cook shit without a fire.
yingyinNormal.zh: 捡柴火去，我没火也做不了饭啊。

yingyinNormal.en: And what belief is that, Mademoiselle Tatou? Anyone can cook.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哪门子信念？乐乐小姐。料理非难事。

yingyinNormal.en: And the truth is, I have no talent at all. But this rat, he's the one behind these recipes. He's the cook. The real cook.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这事实就是 我一点天份也没有，这只老鼠才是食谱的创造者，它是不折不扣的厨师。

yingyinNormal.en: Into my tummy. Maybe we let them cook first, now. OK.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我的肚子里。也许我们让他们先做吧。好的！

yingyinNormal.en: Into my tummy. Maybe we let them cook first, now. OK.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我的肚子里。也许我们让他们先做吧。好的！

yingyinNormal.en: And these babies cook up in like 3 minutes, they're so good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些美味三分钟内就能做好，非常好吃。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr Collins, we are perfectly able to keep a cook. Excellent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们有钱请得起厨子。很棒。

yingyinNormal.en: He was placed into a corner by faulty DNA evidence of the Cook.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他被库克检察院错误的DNA证据逼到了绝境。

yingyinNormal.en: Easy to cook. Easy to eat. Gusteau makes Chinese food. Chineeasy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 轻松煮，轻松吃，食神牌中式速食包, 中国师傅。

yingyinNormal.en: These are fresh noodles. You can cook dried if you have more time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是新鲜面条，如果有时间的话可以煮干一点。

yingyinNormal.en: I got a pit in my stomach the size of a sow's tit. Cook up that rabbit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我肚皮上落了个疤，猪奶头那么大，兔子烤起来。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The FSA has issued a public warning about the risks of a compound called acrylamide that forms in some foods <highlight>cooked</highlight> at high temperatures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: FSA（食品标准局）已就一种被称为丙烯酰胺的化合物带来的风险发出公开警告，这种化合物会在一些食物高温烹饪过程中形成。

examination_example.sentence: There's an awful lot of serious stuff to deal with — work, mortgage payments, figuring out what to <highlight>cook</highlight> for dinner.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一大堆严肃的事情要处理——工作、偿还抵押贷款、弄清楚晚餐该做什么。

examination_example.sentence: All fruits threatening to "go off" will be <highlight>cooked</highlight> or juiced.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有快要“变质”的水果都将被煮熟或榨汁。

examination_example.sentence: You are to write an email to James <highlight>Cook</highlight>, a newly-arrived Australian professor, recommending some tourist attractions in your city.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你要给新来的澳大利亚教授詹姆斯·库克写一封电子邮件，推荐你所在城市的一些旅游景点。

examination_example.sentence: Turns out, according to Daniel <highlight>Cook</highlight>, a historian of childhood consumerism, it was popularised as a marketing trick by clothing manufacturers in the 1930s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据研究儿童消费主义的历史学家丹尼尔·库克的观点，它原来是在20世纪30年代被服装制造商作为一种营销技巧而得以普及的。

sense_info_list.en: someone who prepares and cooks food

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: v. 超量烘烤；过度烘烤；烘烤（或蒸煮）过度；烘烤（或蒸煮）过久
n. 炊具；烹调用具；宜煮食而非生吃的水果

word_family.mean: v. 烹调；煮；烧；篡改；伪造；干得起劲；做得欢；干得好

examination_example.sentence: Its surface has been <highlight>cooked</highlight> and dried by an ocean of carbon dioxide.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的表面已经被大量二氧化碳给烤干了。

examination_example.sentence: You can't <highlight>cook</highlight> bacon and eggs in the oven!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你不能用烤箱烤培根和鸡蛋！

examination_example.sentence: In most cases, the human waste is used on grain crops, which are eventually <highlight>cooked</highlight>, minimizing the risk of transmitting water-borne diseases.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数情况下，人类粪便用于谷物作物上，这些作物最终经过烹煮，从而最大程度地减少了介水传染病的传播风险。

sense_info_list.en: someone who prepares and cooks food

examination_example.sentence: Their servants might include a <highlight>cook</highlight>, a maid, and a nurse for their children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的仆人可能包括一名厨师、一名女仆和一名孩子的保姆。

sense_info_list.en: perform or proceed vigorously or well

word_usage.usage:
cook作名词时，指“做饭的人”，多指“厨师”，为可数名词。而cooker不作“厨师”解，指“炊具”。
示例：She works as a cook in a restaurant. 
她在一家餐馆当厨师。

“为(某人)做饭”可用cook (sb.) sth.或cook sth. (for sb.)表达。
示例：他给我做的午餐。 
正 He cooked me lunch. 
正 He cooked lunch for me.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 烹调；烹饪；用于烹调的；烹调过的食物；适合烹调的
n. 炊具；烹调用具；宜煮食而非生吃的水果

word_family.mean: v. 烹调；煮；烧；篡改；伪造；干得起劲；做得欢；干得好

examination_example.sentence: Even those short of time or money should be encouraged to <highlight>cook</highlight> for themselves and their family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也要鼓励那些即便是没有时间或缺钱的人为自己和家人做饭。

examination_example.sentence: Like any skill, cooking gets easier as you do it more; every time you <highlight>cook</highlight>, you advance your level of skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 像任何技能一样，烹饪越多越容易；每次你做饭，你都提高了你的技术水平。

examination_example.sentence: No one is asking you to give up activities you like, but if you're watching food shows on TV, try <highlight>cooking</highlight> instead.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 没有人要求你放弃你喜欢的活动，但是如果你在看电视上的美食节目，试着做饭。

sense_info_list.en: someone who prepares and cooks food

examination_example.sentence: But the big food companies—which want to sell anything except the raw ingredients that go into cooking—made the home <highlight>cook</highlight> an endangered species.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但大型食品公司——除了用于烹饪的原料之外，他们什么都想卖——让家庭烹饪成为一种罕见事务。

word_usage.usage:
“为(某人)做饭”可用cook (sb.) sth.或cook sth. (for sb.)表达。
示例：他给我做的午餐。 
正 He cooked me lunch. 
正 He cooked lunch for me.

cook作名词时，指“做饭的人”，多指“厨师”，为可数名词。而cooker不作“厨师”解，指“炊具”。
示例：She works as a cook in a restaurant. 
她在一家餐馆当厨师。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (cook up a storm)煮得一手好菜

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 烹调；烹饪；用于烹调的；烹调过的食物；适合烹调的
n. 炊具；烹调用具；宜煮食而非生吃的水果

word_family.mean: v. 烹调；煮；烧；篡改；伪造；干得起劲；做得欢；干得好

examination_example.sentence: This time, she turned down the fire so it <highlight>cooked</highlight> nicely.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一次，她把火调小了，所以煮得很好。

examination_example.sentence: Jenna told Jeff to clean it up so they could continue to <highlight>cook</highlight> the rest of the porridge.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 珍娜让杰夫把它清理干净，这样他们就可以继续煮剩下的粥了。

examination_example.sentence: We sleep in a tent, <highlight>cooked</highlight> over an open fire, and walked a long distance to take the shower and use the bathroom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们睡在帐篷里，在篝火上做饭，走了很长一段路去洗澡和上厕所。

sense_info_list.zh: (cook up a storm)煮得一手好菜

examination_example.sentence: Susanna Reid is used to grilling guests on the sofa every morning, but she is <highlight>cooking</highlight> up a storm in her latest role.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Susanna Reid已经习惯了每天早上在沙发上采访嘉宾，但她最近的角色是煮得一手好菜。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 烹调；烹饪；用于烹调的；烹调过的食物；适合烹调的

word_family.mean: v. 烹调；煮；烧；篡改；伪造；干得起劲；做得欢；干得好

examination_example.sentence: We know that many children can't wash clothes or <highlight>cook</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们知道很多孩子不会洗衣服或做饭。

examination_example.sentence: Chinese food is so delicious that many foreigners are learning to <highlight>cook</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国菜如此美味，以至于许多外国人都在学做中国菜。

examination_example.sentence: At university, I had to learn to shop, prepare my food and <highlight>cook</highlight> meals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在大学里，我必须学会购物、准备食物和做饭。

sense_info_list.en: someone who prepares and cooks food

examination_example.sentence: The rich could also eat special meals prepared by private <highlight>cooks</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 富人还可以吃到私人厨师准备的特殊餐点。

examination_example.sentence: How did the girl express her thanks to the <highlight>cook</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那个女孩是如何向厨师表示感谢的？

examination_example.sentence: She gave money to the <highlight>cook</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她把钱给了厨师。

examination_example.sentence: Why did Tim <highlight>Cook</highlight> keep asking for service?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为什么蒂姆库克一直要求服务？

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Cook</highlight> asked for some water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 库克要了一些水。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Cook</highlight>'s reply: "Best trip I've ever had."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 库克回答说：“那是我经历过的最棒的旅行。”

word_usage.usage:
cook作名词时，指“做饭的人”，多指“厨师”，为可数名词。而cooker不作“厨师”解，指“炊具”。
示例：She works as a cook in a restaurant. 
她在一家餐馆当厨师。

“为(某人)做饭”可用cook (sb.) sth.或cook sth. (for sb.)表达。
示例：他给我做的午餐。 
正 He cooked me lunch. 
正 He cooked lunch for me.
